Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Immediate responses that can be tailored to specific needs, can ask for further clarification, can copy lots of background info straight into AI, can be done by anyone and anywhere with an internet connection, can ask as many follow up questions as you like

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teacher feedback more trustworthy, more specific to the class, teacher more tailored to the question asked
